com.PersonalBlog.services

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.PersonalBlog.services.UserService

  • @RestController
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all restful services for users.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createUser(@Valid com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode objectNode)
      This method creates a user if the user that is creating a new user is a "admin" user.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteUser(@Valid com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode objectNode)
      This method deletes a user if the user that is trying to delete it is an "admin" user.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity login(@Valid User user)
      This method checks if a user exists in the database.

      • login

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
 @PostMapping(value="/login")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity login(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                 @Valid User user)
        This method checks if a user exists in the database. If that user exits and the credentials sent in the frontend matches with the data in the database, then this method perform a login in the website.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity
